alert.note: Alert for Larue; Marion; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 9:50AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nelson, northeastern Larue, northwestern Marion and east central Hardin Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 950 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Elizabethtown, moving east southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Marion, southwestern Nelson, east central Hardin and northeastern Larue Counties, including the following locations... Lyons, Gethsemane, Athertonville, Howardstown, Blue Gap, Culvertown, Gleanings, Roanoke, Balltown and Younger Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon EDT for central Kentucky.
